LanguageData.SwampFever.label: swamp fever
LanguageData.SwampFever.description: An infectious disease similar to malaria often carried by horses and other domestic animals.
LanguageData.SwampFever.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.SwampFever.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.SwampFever.stages.2.label: major
LanguageData.SwampFever.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.RatPlagueMain.label: plague
LanguageData.RatPlagueMain.description: An infectious disease caused by bacteria from rat bites.
LanguageData.RatPlagueMain.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.RatPlagueMain.stages.1.label: major
LanguageData.RatPlagueMain.stages.2.label: extreme
LanguageData.RatPlagueMain.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.label: venom poisoning
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.description: Poisoning due to large amounts of snake venom entering an animals bloodstream. Can be treated using an antivenom created through synthesising the very venom that caused the poisoning.
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.stages.1.label: minor
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.stages.2.label: moderate
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.stages.3.label: major
LanguageData.VenomPoisoning.stages.4.label: extreme
LanguageData.SpelopedeSickness.label: spelopede sickness
LanguageData.SpelopedeSickness.description: A minor sickness caused due to the small amounts of venom delivered through a spelopede's attack.
LanguageData.SpelopedeSickness.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.SpelopedeSickness.stages.1.label: moderate
LanguageData.SpelopedeSickness.stages.2.label: major
LanguageData.SpelopedeSickness.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.MegaSpiderParalysis.label: megaspider paralysis
LanguageData.MegaSpiderParalysis.description: Paralysis caused through prolonged and large quantities of megaspider venom in an animal's bloodstream. Extremely dangerous and well know to many tribes as uncureable though for glitterworlds it's merely an annoyance, more advanced research is clearly needed to stop it.
LanguageData.MegaSpiderParalysis.stages.0.label: minor
LanguageData.MegaSpiderParalysis.stages.1.label: moderate
LanguageData.MegaSpiderParalysis.stages.2.label: major
LanguageData.MegaSpiderParalysis.stages.3.label: extreme
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.label: snake venom
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.description: Venom that has begun to build up in the bloodstream due to a snake attack. Too much venom and poisoning could incur which can be fatal if left untreated.
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.SnakeVenom.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.label: megascarab venom
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.description: Venom that has begun to build up in the bloodstream due to a megascarab attack. Large amounts of venom need to build up before any real issues are caused and even then it's often a minor annoyance at for most that experience it.
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.MegaScarabVenom.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.label: spelopede venom
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.description: Venom that has begun to build up in the bloodstream due to a spelopede attack. Large quantities can cause sickness, though this sickness is never fatal and is usually nothing more than minor sickness for a day or two.
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.SpelopedeVenom.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.label: megaspider venom
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.description: Venom that has begun to build up in the bloodstream due to a megaspider attack. Too much venom and paralysis could incur, one of the most dangerous illness known to this rimworld.
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.MegaSpiderVenom.stages.5.label: extreme
LanguageData.RatPlague.label: rat germs
LanguageData.RatPlague.description: Germs caused by rat bites, it often carries disease - plague being the most common.
LanguageData.RatPlague.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.RatPlague.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.RatPlague.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.RatPlague.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.RatPlague.stages.4.label: serious
LanguageData.RatPlague.stages.5.label: extreme
